headline: Carrier Launches Lynx FacTOR: Automating Pharmaceutical Product Release Evaluations for Improved Speed and Accuracy
summary: Carrier Global Corporation (NYSE: CARR), global leader in intelligent climate and energy solutions, announces the launch of Carrier Lynx FacTOR™, a revolutionary software-as-a-service (SaaS) solution designed to transform product release processes in the pharmaceutical industry. Lynx FacTOR automates end-to-end product release evaluations, minimizing manual processes and safely accelerating product movement in the cold chain. The name FacTOR represents the critical impact of 'time out of range'
